name: Fibonacci
description:
Fibonacci
In the world of Fibonacci, everything is math puns! Travel across the Percent Isles as Addendo searches for Vector, a former hero multiplier legend turned rogue in a 30 minute prologue that demo's the standard game mechanics made in RPG Maker MV.Features
  • Unique musical score
  • Math related elemental system
  • 30 minutes of gameplay
